name: Invaders from Androidia (Free Space Shooter)
description:
Free arcade space shooter. Invaders from the Androidia Galaxy have traveled through space to reach your outer moon...You must defeat the attacking swarm of invaders before they infiltrate your base and then move on to Earth. Use your base as a shield from the alien missiles and exploding fireballs.
Destroy the Mystery Ship for bonus points.

Classic retro space shooter action, fast paced and colorful arcade action - you need to destroy the advancing aliens quickly as they will speed up over time.

Try to achieve the highest score... It won't be easy, Good Luck!
Please leave a review if you enjoy the game

Now includes Dark Mode too!

Up for a challenge: Try "Dark Mode" and destroy aliens with only your cannon spotlight!

Listed "Best Apps of the Month" - AndroidTapp

Fluid Gameplay, fun and challenging shooter

Inspired by retro classic space shooter games.

Please Rate if you enjoy it!

Features:
★ Easy to play, Hard to master
★ No Inapp purchases!
★ Fast smooth action on phone or tablet
★ Includes Destructible shield bases
★ New original "Dark Mode" difficulty (now included)
★ Fireball bombs
★ Great sound effects!
★ Retro arcade feel
★ Global Scoreboard (to get on it score over 3000+ points)
★ 3 Control modes (Buttons or 1 Finger Drag or 2 Finger Drag)
★ Score bonuses for shooting Mystery Ship
★ Great - Optional CRT scanlines!! (New Version)
★ Responsive controls
★ Multi-touch with fire button on top right of screen

**** Please Rate Us & follow on Twitter for updates @Gazzapper ****


*** Controls ***
Button Control:
Left / Right / Fire buttons on bottom of screen (Recommended)


Drag Control:
2 Finger Drag Mode: Touch bottom screen to have ship follow your finger and tap screen above the ship to fire.


2 Finger Side Mode: Move and fire your ship by pressing each side of the screen. Tap above ship to fire.
